import React, {useState} from 'react' import { propTypes } from 'react-bootstrap/esm/Image'; import spiritualapi from './API/spiritualapi' import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; const Spiritual = (props) => { const[placesData, setPlaceData] =useState(spiritualapi); console.log(placesData); return (
{ placesData.map((curElem) => { const {image, title, info,to,name,p1,p2,p3,p4} = curElem; return( <>

{title}

{info}

  • {p1}
  • {p2}
  • {p3}
  • {p4}

) }) }
) } export default Spiritual
